subdisciplines.name: Chromatography
subdisciplines.description: The separation and identification of chemical mixtures, ranging from small amounts of a substance to large quantities of complex mixtures.

subdisciplines.name: Mass Spectrometry
subdisciplines.description: The measurement of the characteristics of individual atoms or molecules in a sample, including their mass, charge, and other properties.

subdisciplines.name: Spectroscopy
subdisciplines.description: The study of the interaction between electromagnetic radiation and matter, used to identify and quantify chemical compounds.
